security: This material contains information affecting the National Defense of the United States within the meaning of the Espionage Laws, Title 18, U.S.C. Secs. 793 and 794, the transmission or revelation of which in any manner to an unauthorized person is prohibited by law.
summary: This document is a CIA report detailing information from sources in various cities concerning individuals and their activities, including reports of anti-American sentiments and contacts within academic and political circles.
summary_one_paragraph: A CIA report, dated 14 December 1961, summarizes unevaluated information from multiple sources (including Clog & Singer and Beviot Bacar Shat), concerning several individuals. The report mentions contacts within academic circles and their sentiments, including information about a professor, Herman Mark Muving, and his interactions, and mentions anti-American feelings expressed by individuals tied to cultural events.
title: Report on Various Individuals and Activities
